title: Is the MAC client broken?
body:
lots of fps issues and yesterday i got bug  splat 3 times... until i repaired, then everything got fine
no issues at all, quick loading screen, no fps issues... then today, i can barely get in game
without having to restart client.. idk
maybe its just my computer

replies.body:
If you are on macOS 10.12 Sierra, there are certainly going to be some weird interactions here and there until we've completely gotten a handle on them.

What specific issue do you see what you're forced to restart your client to get into game?

i havent updated my mac to latest one yet, but my friend got the same issue as me
sometimes it takes a long time for the loading screen to appear, or never joins the game even tho its 100%
but i can play fine on my 2008 laptop, even if its laggy

but ive been having some issues lately

It's possible there are some network misconfigurations on the mac that are causing the issues. Our [Mac Connection Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#section-mac) will walk you through configuring all your settings to be compatible with League, so I'd recommend starting there.

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
